channel.title: Compile.Bat error. --PLEASE READ! ++ REP IF YOU HELP SUCCESSFULY
channel.description:
OK - I have followed Mod Taharok's Guide to making a server, and when I double click on Compile.bat it comes up with "system cannot find the path specified".
I have edited Compile.bat already to this -- [code]@echo off title [name] Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]
Any ideas?

watever i do to compile.bat it says same for me

item.title: Compile.Bat error. --PLEASE READ! ++ REP IF YOU HELP SUCCESSFULY
item.dc:creator: @Cr34T1 Cr34T1
item.description:
@Cr34T1 wrote:

download jdk1.5.0_10 then do liek i did instal an then coppy files from jre1.5.0_06 in toher safe place then u can delate from C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06 all ifles inside and go to
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10 coppy that files and paste too C:\Program File \Java\jre1.5.0_06 and than in copiler edit all in this

@echo off
title ur server name Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin\javac” *.java
pause

then its must work

GOOD LUCK

If u didint understand then i dont now bicose i say every think what i did when i geted eror :D[br][size=1]Posted at: December 13, 2006, 03:02:54 PM[/size][hr][quote=“PKOwner, post:6, topic:34970”]@echo off
title servername
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_XXinjavac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

XX is the update of the jdk you’re using
Example version 5.0 update 10 is
1.5.0_10

and update 9 is
1.5.0_09[/quote]

he nead compiler not server start

item.title: Compile.Bat error. --PLEASE READ! ++ REP IF YOU HELP SUCCESSFULY
item.dc:creator: @PKOwner PKOwner
item.description:
@PKOwner wrote:

@echo off
title servername
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_XX\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

XX is the update of the jdk you’re using
Example version 5.0 update 10 is
1.5.0_10

and update 9 is
1.5.0_09

item.title: Compile.Bat error. --PLEASE READ! ++ REP IF YOU HELP SUCCESSFULY
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote=“unit L, post:1, topic:34970”]OK - I have followed Mod Taharok’s Guide to making a server, and when I double click on Compile.bat it comes up with “system cannot find the path specified”.

I have edited Compile.bat already to this –

@echo off title [name] Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Any ideas?[/quote]

Change the code to: @echo off title GettoPKscape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause That should fix it.

Read full topic
